data.name: Lust Dungeon - Supporter Art Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get all the naughty renders from your adventures of rescuing Korin AND help the development of our spicy games at the same time...

You will get:
  • All the sexy renders from the game
  • All the renders of the characters and poses used in the game
  • Bonus renders - never seen before
  • Good feeling of supporting a small indie studio!

How to access the files?
  • Right click on the game in Steam
  • Click Properties and Local Files tab
  • Click on Browse Local Files
  • You will see the folder called DLC and inside, you will find your reward!

Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

package_groups.title: Buy Lust Dungeon - Supporter Art Pack

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity. Some scenes contain realistic blood and wounds. There are also some scenes containing physical violence and sexual assault. The sexual acts are however done in a way where both characters enjoy the act.
